name: PublishCodeCovCoverage
description: Uploads code coverage reports to Codecov.io
author: Viscalyx

inputs.name: testResultFolderName
inputs.label: Test Result Folder Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the test result folder containing the code coverage report

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Enable Verbose Output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable verbose output for the Codecov uploader

inputs.name: coverageFileName
inputs.label: Coverage File Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the coverage file (e.g., 'coverage.xml'). If specified, argument -f will be used with this file. If not specified, argument -s will be used with the test result folder path.

inputs.name: networkRootFolder
inputs.label: Network Root Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the root folder to help Codecov correctly map the file paths in the report to the repository structure. Sets the --network-root-folder argument when specified.

inputs.name: codecovToken
inputs.label: Codecov Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The token for uploading coverage to Codecov.io. If not provided, it will look for the CODECOV_TOKEN environment variable.
